element.name: TSprite
element.short: This is a (advanced) record that contains all information about sprites

element.name: TSprite.spos
element.short: The Position to display the Sprite (Upper left corner)

element.name: TSprite.Step
element.short: The (intenal) Number of the image to display

element.name: TSprite.Init
element.short: This procedure initiates the sprite at a given position

element.name: TSprite.Paint
element.short: Paint the Shape to a Canvas

element.name: TSprite.Free
element.short: Frees all allocated data of the sprite
